text.logged_in_message: The game must reload for the login to take effect
text.error.color: That color is not supported (use hex)
text.error.range: That location is out of range
text.entity.description.wind: A light and fast ship capable of screening and providing reconnaissance for larger vessels.
text.entity.description.mosquito: Small but reliable, the Mosquito often serves as an escort in fleets traveling long distances.
text.entity.description.inca: Lightly armed but heavily armored, the Inca best serves in defensive roles.
text.entity.description.pilsung: The Pilsung is the backbone of most fleets.
text.entity.description.hurricane: The Hurricane is capable of sustained combat against a substantial force.
text.entity.description.horizon: The dreadnought's name comes from the shape of the superweapon located on the bottom of it's hull.
text.entity.description.cillus: A kilometer long ship with no armarment to speak of, it is the pack mule of many fleets.
text.entity.description.apis: Large but reliable transports, they can carry large amounts of resources with the consequence of very little defenses.
text.item.description.quartz: A crystal perfect for focusing lasers.
text.item.description.hydrogen: Highly reactive and good for making fuels.
text.item.description.ancient_tech: Technology lost by a long forgot civilization.
text.item.description.code_snippets: Pieces of AIs and starship control programs.
text.tech.description.thrust: Improves the efficiency of drives, allowing your fleet to go faster
text.tech.description.energy:
Increases hyperdrive energy capacity and decreases cooldown
+5% energy / level
-2% / level
text.tech.description.missle:
Increases crit chance and crit damage
+1% crit chance
+5% crit damage
text.tech.description.salvage: Increases chance for rare items by 2% / level
